name: gyazo-search
title: Gyazo Search
description: Search your Gyazo images and copy URLs to clipboard
author: mtane0412

commands.name: search-gyazo
commands.title: Search Gyazo
commands.description: Search Gyazo images and copy URL to clipboard

preferences.name: accessToken
preferences.title: Gyazo Access Token
preferences.description: Your Gyazo API access token (required for search functionality)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
